summary: REQ-1 appears implemented via updated branding constants in `frontend/src/lib/branding.ts`. REQ-2 is only partially implemented: `frontend/index.html` title was updated, but the landing page hero, header brand text, and footer copyright still reference the old name per the provided summaries. Additionally, `project_state.json` was modified even though it was not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace all user-facing occurrences of the old app name ("K's Lab Customization") with "K's Lab repair and customization" across the marketing landing page hero heading, header brand text, footer copyright line, and the HTML document <title>.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the HTML <title> updated, but the landing page hero heading, header brand text, and footer copyright are still described as displaying "K's Lab Customization" in the provided file summaries.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (truncated) — `frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx`: "hero section now displaying \"K's Lab Customization\" as the main heading"
frontend-file-summaries.txt (truncated) — `frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx`: "now displaying \"K's Lab Customization\" as the brand name"
frontend-file-summaries.txt (truncated) — `frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx`: "copyright line now showing \"K's Lab Customization\""

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `project_state.json` (tracking/metadata state changes such as pending statuses and projectName)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to rename the app across branding and metadata (constants and user-facing UI/title). It does not request changes to internal project tracking files.
